short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extenstion that removes the notification counter in tab titles

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you don't like when websites like YouTube and Facebook show the number of notifications you have on the tab bar then this is for you. No Notif Counter is a chrome extension that hides the notification counter on the tab bar so you aren't distracted from the important things.
